title: State of Panic
description: When Sierra Montgomery witnesses the brutal murder of her fiancée she faces a dangerous choice. Run or die. Desperate and terrified, she flees the scene, praying the killer hasn’t seen her. Armed with little more than the clothes on her back, she sets out to elude a madman. But everything changes when she discovers a photograph with the word Foxtrot scrawled on the back. And when another loved is murdered in similar fashion, Sierra realizes that behind the mounting coincidences lurks a chilling conspiracy. One that places her on a collision course with Skinbone Harris, a paid assassin whose mission is to bring down Foxtrot at any cost.It soon becomes clear to Sierra that she holds the key to something extremely valuable, a secret that places her life in grave danger. She soon pulls a cyber genius named Shark into a frightening web of corruption and deceit that threatens not only their lives but the fabric of society. An act of terror that began on a quiet Chicago street takes them on an insidious journey through the halls of multibillion-dollar corporation, The FBI and a quiet Arizona town as they piece together a mystery that grows more explosive with every new detail.
author: Lori  Gordon
